title: noche
author: noche
content: Hi to all, I start mining today and I have 1.39M Pending Shares, what's means?https://i.ibb.co/37hnjRq/1.png

comments.author: philipma1957
comments.body: Quote from: noche on October 02, 2023, 09:46:41 PMHi to all, I start mining today and I have 1.39M Pending Shares, what's means?the image is too small. where are you mining.what pool?shares keep track of your work.more shares mean more earnings.but I do not know where you are miningand I do not know what gear you are using.

comments.author: noche
comments.body: Quote from: philipma1957 on October 02, 2023, 11:31:29 PMQuote from: noche on October 02, 2023, 09:46:41 PMHi to all, I start mining today and I have 1.39M Pending Shares, what's means?https://i.ibb.co/37hnjRq/1.pngthe image is too small. where are you miningBTC in taz mining

comments.author: philipma1957
comments.body: https://tazmining.ch/seems to be okay.  i never used them.what is your gear.

comments.author: noche
comments.body: Official reply:QuoteThe pending share is the valid calculation your Asic, GPU or CPU was found. On your case is not necessary because on Mine on Pool Solo. If you found a block BTC you win a totality of coins. If you Mine on Pool PPLNS the coins is shared with all Miners, More you have shares and more you win.All the best.
